title: Ex-Minister Johnston at the CID
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Minister Johnston Fernando appeared to the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) on Tuesday (24) to provide a statement regarding the attacks on the MynaGoGama and GotaGoGama peaceful protests sites on the 9th of May 2022.
The Criminal Investigation Department (CID) stated that statements are to be recorded from him at present.
Rich Countries Putting Children Around The World At Risk: UN
